dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5852 IH: End GCCI Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Norman introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit the expenditure of funds to carry out the Global Climate Change Initiative of the United States Agency for International Development, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the End GCCI Act.

section.header: Prohibition on expenditure of funds to carry out the Global Climate Change Initiative of the United States Agency for International Development
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the Administrator of the United States Agency for International Development may not obligate or expend any funds on or after the date of the enactment of this Act to carry out the Global Climate Change Initiative of the Agency. Any such unobligated and unexpended funds shall be deposited in the Treasury of the United States.
